name: Classic Beef Burger
description: A juicy beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, assemble with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and bun.

name: Cheese Burger
description: A classic cheeseburger with cheddar cheese, lettuce, and tomato.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add cheddar cheese, assemble with lettuce, tomato, and bun.

name: Bacon Burger
description: A savory burger with crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, cook bacon until crispy, assemble with lettuce, tomato, and bun.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious veggie burger made with a variety of vegetables.
howToMake: Cook the veggie patty, assemble with lettuce, tomato, and bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A flavorful chicken burger with lettuce and mayo.
howToMake: Grill the chicken patty, assemble with lettuce, mayo, and bun.

name: Spicy Burger
description: A hot and spicy burger with jalapenos and pepper jack cheese.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add jalapenos and pepper jack cheese, assemble with bun.

name: BBQ Burger
description: A tangy BBQ burger with onion rings and BBQ sauce.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add BBQ sauce, top with onion rings, and assemble with bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: A savory burger with sautéed mushrooms and Swiss cheese.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, sauté mushrooms, add Swiss cheese, and assemble with bun.

name: Double Cheeseburger
description: A double stacked cheeseburger with extra cheese and toppings.
howToMake: Grill two beef patties, add cheese on both, assemble with lettuce, tomato, and bun.

name: Avocado Burger
description: A healthy burger with fresh avocado slices.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add fresh avocado slices, assemble with lettuce, tomato, and bun.

name: Turkey Burger
description: A lean turkey burger with cranberry sauce and stuffing.
howToMake: Grill the turkey patty, add cranberry sauce and stuffing, assemble with bun.

name: Fish Burger
description: A crispy fish fillet burger with tartar sauce and lettuce.
howToMake: Fry the fish fillet, add tartar sauce, assemble with lettuce and bun.

name: Buffalo Chicken Burger
description: A spicy buffalo chicken burger with blue cheese dressing.
howToMake: Grill the chicken patty, coat in buffalo sauce, add blue cheese dressing, and assemble with bun.

name: Hawaiian Burger
description: A tropical burger with pineapple, ham, and teriyaki sauce.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add grilled pineapple and ham, coat with teriyaki sauce, and assemble with bun.

name: Mexican Burger
description: A spicy burger with guacamole, jalapenos, and salsa.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add guacamole, jalapenos, and salsa, assemble with bun.

name: Philly Cheesesteak Burger
description: A burger with shaved steak, onions, peppers, and provolone cheese.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, sauté shaved steak with onions and peppers, add provolone cheese, and assemble with bun.

name: Greek Burger
description: A Mediterranean-inspired burger with feta cheese and tzatziki sauce.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add feta cheese, top with tzatziki sauce, and assemble with bun.

name: Swiss Mushroom Turkey Burger
description: A turkey burger with sautéed mushrooms and Swiss cheese.
howToMake: Grill the turkey patty, sauté mushrooms, add Swiss cheese, and assemble with bun.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Burger
description: A chicken burger with teriyaki sauce and pineapple.
howToMake: Grill the chicken patty, add teriyaki sauce and grilled pineapple, assemble with bun.

name: Pepper Jack Burger
description: A spicy burger with pepper jack cheese and jalapenos.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add pepper jack cheese and jalapenos, assemble with bun.

name: Black Bean Burger
description: A healthy black bean burger with avocado and salsa.
howToMake: Cook the black bean patty, add avocado and salsa, assemble with bun.

name: Blue Cheese Burger
description: A rich burger with blue cheese and caramelized onions.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add blue cheese and caramelized onions, assemble with bun.

name: Pulled Pork Burger
description: A hearty burger with pulled pork and coleslaw.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add pulled pork and coleslaw, assemble with bun.

name: Caprese Burger
description: A fresh burger with mozzarella, basil, and tomato.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add mozzarella, basil, and tomato, assemble with bun.

name: Fried Egg Burger
description: A delicious burger with a fried egg and bacon.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, fry an egg, add bacon, assemble with bun.

name: Truffle Burger
description: A gourmet burger with truffle oil and mushrooms.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, sauté mushrooms in truffle oil, assemble with bun.

name: Brie Burger
description: A luxurious burger with brie cheese and caramelized onions.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add brie cheese and caramelized onions, assemble with bun.

name: Kimchi Burger
description: A fusion burger with kimchi and spicy mayo.
howToMake: Grill the beef patty, add kimchi and spicy mayo, assemble with bun.

name: Lamb Burger
description: A flavorful lamb burger with mint yogurt sauce.
howToMake: Grill the lamb patty, add mint yogurt sauce, assemble with bun.

name: Falafel Burger
description: A vegetarian falafel burger with tahini sauce.
howToMake: Cook the falafel patty, add tahini sauce, assemble with bun.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
howToMake: Spread tomato sauce on pizza base, add mozzarella, bake until crust is golden, garnish with basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pizza topped with pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.
howToMake: Spread tomato sauce on pizza base, add pepperoni slices, cover with mozzarella, bake until golden.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Pasta with homemade basil pesto sauce.
howToMake: Cook pasta al dente, toss with basil pesto sauce, garnish with grated Parmesan.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Italian pasta dish with creamy egg and Parmesan sauce, bacon.
howToMake: Cook spaghetti al dente, toss with egg-Parmesan sauce, bacon, serve hot.

name: Ravioli with Tomato Sauce
description: Homemade ravioli stuffed with cheese, served with tomato sauce.
howToMake: Boil ravioli until tender, serve with tomato sauce, garnish with basil.

name: Seafood Linguine
description: Linguine pasta with assorted seafood in white wine sauce.
howToMake: Cook linguine al dente, sauté seafood in white wine sauce, toss with pasta, serve hot.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: Pizza topped with mozzarella, Parmesan, Gorgonzola, and ricotta cheeses.
howToMake: Spread pizza dough with tomato sauce, add cheeses, bake until bubbly and golden.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: Penne pasta in spicy tomato sauce with garlic and chili flakes.
howToMake: Cook penne al dente, sauté garlic and chili flakes in olive oil, add tomato sauce, toss with pasta, serve hot.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and balsamic glaze.
howToMake: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella, arrange on plate, garnish with basil leaves, drizzle with balsamic glaze.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layered lasagna with vegetables, ricotta, and marinara sauce.
howToMake: Layer lasagna noodles with vegetables, ricotta cheese, marinara sauce, bake until bubbly.

name: Classic Hotdog
description: Grilled sausage in a bun with ketchup and mustard.
howToMake: Grill sausage, place in bun, add ketchup and mustard, serve hot.

name: Nachos with Cheese
description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.
howToMake: Arrange tortilla chips on a plate, melt cheese, add jalapenos and salsa, serve.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings with barbecue sauce.
howToMake: Coat chicken wings in barbecue sauce, bake until crispy, serve hot.

name: Potato Wedges
description: Seasoned potato wedges baked until crispy.
howToMake: Cut potatoes into wedges, toss with olive oil and seasoning, bake until golden brown.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Breaded mozzarella sticks fried until golden and served with marinara sauce.
howToMake: Coat mozzarella sticks in breadcrumbs, fry until golden brown, serve with marinara sauce.

name: Onion Rings
description: Crunchy onion rings battered and fried until golden.
howToMake: Slice onions into rings, dip in batter, fry until crispy, serve hot.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted bread with garlic butter and herbs.
howToMake: Spread garlic butter on bread, sprinkle with herbs, toast until golden brown.

name: Stuffed Jalapenos
description: Jalapeno peppers stuffed with cream cheese and wrapped in bacon.
howToMake: Fill jalapeno halves with cream cheese, wrap with bacon, bake until bacon is crispy.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with tomatoes, garlic, and basil.
howToMake: Toast bread slices, top with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, drizzle with olive oil.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Slow-cooked barbecue ribs served with coleslaw and fries.
howToMake: Season ribs, slow-cook in barbecue sauce, serve with coleslaw and fries.

name: Grilled Ribeye Steak
description: Juicy ribeye steak grilled to perfection.
howToMake: Season steak, grill to desired doneness, rest before serving.

name: Crispy Fried Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken served with coleslaw and fries.
howToMake: Coat chicken in seasoned flour, deep fry until golden brown, serve hot.

name: Salmon Fillet
description: Grilled salmon fillet served with lemon butter sauce.
howToMake: Season salmon, grill until flaky, serve with lemon butter sauce.

name: Beef Burger
description: Classic beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
howToMake: Grill beef patty, assemble with lettuce, tomato, cheese, serve in bun.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Sautéed shrimp in garlic butter sauce served over pasta.
howToMake: Sauté shrimp in garlic butter, toss with pasta, garnish with parsley, serve hot.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Soft tacos filled with grilled fish, cabbage slaw, and avocado.
howToMake: Grill fish, assemble tacos with slaw, avocado, serve with lime wedges.

name: Lamb Gyros
description: Greek-style lamb gyro wrap with tzatziki sauce.
howToMake: Grill lamb, wrap in pita with tzatziki sauce, lettuce, tomato, onion.

name: Pork Schnitzel
description: Breaded and fried pork cutlet served with mashed potatoes.
howToMake: Coat pork cutlet in breadcrumbs, fry until golden, serve with mashed potatoes.

name: Beef Kebabs
description: Grilled beef kebabs marinated in Mediterranean spices.
howToMake: Marinate beef chunks, skewer with vegetables, grill until beef is cooked through.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken over fettuccine pasta.
howToMake: Cook fettuccine al dente, toss with Alfredo sauce, grilled chicken, garnish with parsley.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta with Bolognese sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella cheese.
howToMake: Layer pasta with Bolognese sauce, ricotta, mozzarella, bake until cheese is bubbly.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi rolls with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.
howToMake: Prepare sushi rice, roll with assorted fillings, slice into pieces, serve with soy sauce, ginger, and wasabi.

name: Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.
howToMake: Stir-fry noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, tamarind sauce, garnish with lime and cilantro.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Indian dish with grilled chicken in creamy tomato sauce.
howToMake: Grill chicken, simmer in creamy tomato sauce with spices, serve hot.

name: Ramen Bowl
description: Japanese noodle soup with pork belly, egg, and vegetables.
howToMake: Cook ramen noodles, top with pork belly, egg, vegetables, serve in broth.

name: Beef Wellington
description: Beef tenderloin coated with mushrooms and wrapped in puff pastry.
howToMake: Sear beef, wrap with mushroom duxelles in puff pastry, bake until golden brown.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: Healthy salad with quinoa, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette.
howToMake: Cook quinoa, toss with avocado, tomatoes, vinaigrette, garnish with parsley.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Mexican tacos with marinated pork, pineapple, and cilantro.
howToMake: Marinate pork, grill with pineapple, serve in tortillas with cilantro, onion.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian risotto with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
howToMake: Sauté mushrooms, cook risotto with broth, finish with Parmesan cheese.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant slices baked with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
howToMake: Bread eggplant slices, bake with marinara sauce, mozzarella until cheese melts.

name: Green Curry Chicken
description: Thai green curry with chicken, bamboo shoots, and basil.
howToMake: Simmer chicken in green curry paste, add coconut milk, bamboo shoots, basil, serve hot.

name: Pad See Ew
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with chicken, broccoli, and sweet soy sauce.
howToMake: Stir-fry chicken with rice noodles, broccoli, soy sauce, garnish with lime.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: Spicy Thai soup with shrimp, lemongrass, and lime.
howToMake: Simmer shrimp in broth with lemongrass, lime leaves, chili, serve hot.

name: Massaman Curry
description: Thai curry with beef, potatoes, peanuts, and coconut milk.
howToMake: Simmer beef with Massaman curry paste, coconut milk, potatoes, peanuts, serve hot.

name: Papaya Salad
description: Thai salad with shredded green papaya, tomatoes, peanuts, and lime dressing.
howToMake: Shred papaya, toss with tomatoes, peanuts, lime dressing, garnish with cilantro.

name: Thai Iced Tea
description: Sweet Thai iced tea with condensed milk.
howToMake: Brew Thai tea, pour over ice, sweeten with condensed milk, serve cold.

name: Red Curry Beef
description: Spicy Thai red curry with beef, bell peppers, and basil.
howToMake: Simmer beef in red curry paste, coconut milk, bell peppers, basil, serve hot.

name: Chicken Satay
description: Grilled chicken skewers with peanut sauce.
howToMake: Marinate chicken, grill skewers, serve with peanut sauce, cucumber salad.

name: Thai Green Papaya Salad
description: Shredded green papaya, tomatoes, green beans, peanuts, and dried shrimp in a spicy lime dressing.
howToMake: Shred green papaya, tomatoes, green beans, peanuts, dried shrimp, and mix in spicy lime dressing.

name: Thai Mango Sticky Rice
description: Sweet sticky rice topped with ripe mango slices and drizzled with coconut sauce.
howToMake: Cook sticky rice, slice ripe mango, drizzle coconut sauce, and serve.

name: Espresso
description: Strong black coffee made by forcing steam through finely-ground coffee beans.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso using an espresso machine.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso with frothy steamed milk and a sprinkle of cocoa powder.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso, steam milk to create froth, combine with espresso, sprinkle cocoa powder.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a small amount of froth.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso, steam milk to create a small amount of froth, combine with espresso.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso 'stained' with a small amount of steamed milk.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso, add a small amount of steamed milk.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, similar strength to drip coffee.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso, add hot water to dilute.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso, steam milk, mix with chocolate syrup, top with whipped cream.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee with ice cubes.
howToMake: Brew coffee, chill, serve over ice cubes.

name: Affogato
description: Vanilla gelato 'drowned' with a shot of hot espresso.
howToMake: Place a scoop of vanilla gelato in a cup, pour a shot of hot espresso over it.

name: Flat White
description: Espresso with velvety steamed milk, less frothy than a cappuccino.
howToMake: Brew a shot of espresso, steam milk to create velvety texture, combine with espresso.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Strong coffee brewed by boiling finely ground coffee beans with water and sugar.
howToMake: Boil finely ground coffee beans with water and sugar, pour into a cup without filtering.

name: Green Tea
description: Light and refreshing tea made from unfermented tea leaves.
howToMake: Steep green tea leaves in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.

name: Black Tea
description: Full-bodied tea made from fully oxidized tea leaves.
howToMake: Steep black tea leaves in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.

name: Earl Grey
description: Black tea flavored with oil of bergamot.
howToMake: Steep black tea leaves with oil of bergamot in hot water, strain and serve.

name: Chai Tea
description: Spiced black tea with milk and sugar.
howToMake: Boil black tea with spices, add milk and sugar, strain and serve.

name: Oolong Tea
description: Traditional Chinese tea with a sweet and floral aroma.
howToMake: Steep oolong tea leaves in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.

name: Jasmine Tea
description: Green tea scented with jasmine flowers.
howToMake: Steep green tea leaves with jasmine flowers in hot water, strain and serve.

name: Peppermint Tea
description: Herbal tea made from peppermint leaves.
howToMake: Steep peppermint leaves in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.

name: Chamomile Tea
description: Herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers.
howToMake: Steep dried chamomile flowers in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.

name: Rooibos Tea
description: Red herbal tea with a slightly sweet and nutty flavor.
howToMake: Steep rooibos tea leaves in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.

name: Hibiscus Tea
description: Herbal tea made from dried hibiscus flowers.
howToMake: Steep dried hibiscus flowers in hot water for a few minutes, strain and serve.
